Default.description: Use for primary text, such as body copy, sentence case headers, and buttons.

Subtle.description: Use for secondary text, such as supporting text and all caps subheadings.

Subtlest.description: Use for tertiary text, such as meta-data, input field labels  breadcrumbs and helper text

Disabled.description: Use for text in a disabled state or/and texts paired with icon.disabled

Inverse.description: Use for text on bold backgrounds or/and texts paired with icon.inverse

Action.description: Use for tertiary links in a default or hovered state. (Add an underline for hovered states for tertiary links) or texts paired with icon.action

Danger.description: Use for destructive links or to communicate critical information, such as those used in error handling or texts paired with icon.success

Warning.description: Use for warning links to communicate caution/warning, such as those used in warning section messages or texts paired with icon.warning

Success.description: Use for warning links to communicate caution/warning, such as those used in warning section messages or texts paired with icon.success
